00051 volatile sig_atomic_t sigterminate;
00052 
00053 void catchterminate(int sig)
00054 {
00055   sigterminate = 1;
00056   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00057   signal(sig, catchterminate);
00058 }

00063 static struct {
00064   int log;
00065   const char* logfile;
00066   int maxsteps;
00067   const Interaction* Int;
00068   int par;
00069   const Constraint* Const;
00070   int nconst;
00071   Para* q;
00072   Parameterization* P;
00073   SlaterDet* Q;
00074   SlaterDet* Qp;
00075   SlaterDetAux* X;
00076   gradSlaterDetAux* dX;
00077   gradSlaterDet* dH, *dHd, *dHp, *dNd, *dNp;
00078 } Min;

00082 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00083 {
00084   int i;
00085   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00086     q->x[i] = x[i];
00087 }

00090 void MinimizeDONLP2p(const Interaction* Int, int par,
00091                      const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
00092                      Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00093                      int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
00094 {
00095   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00096   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00097   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00098 
00099   Min.log = log;
00100   Min.logfile = logfile;
00101   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00102   Min.Int = Int;
00103   Min.par = par;
00104   Min.Const = Const;
00105   Min.nconst = nconst;
00106   Min.q = q;
00107   Min.P = P;
00108   Min.Q = (SlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00109   Min.Qp = (SlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00110   Min.X = (SlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00111   Min.dX = (gradSlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00112   Min.dH = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00113   Min.dHd = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00114   Min.dHp = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00115   Min.dNd = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00116   Min.dNp = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00117 
00118   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q);
00119   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Qp);
00120   initSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00121   initgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.dX);
00122   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dH);
00123   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dHd);
00124   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dHp);
00125   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dNd);
00126   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dNp);
00127 
00128   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
00129   if (!setjmp(env))
00130     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
00131 
00132   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
00133 }

00136 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
00137 {
00138   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00139 
00140   if (sigterminate)
00141     longjmp(env, 1);
00142   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00143   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00144   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00145   nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00146 #ifdef MPI
00147   calcHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, &hd);
00148 #else
00149   calcHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, &hd);
00150 #endif
00151   copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00152   invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00153   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X);
00154   np = Min.X->ovlap;
00155 #ifdef MPI
00156   calcHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, &hp);
00157 #else
00158   calcHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, &hp);
00159 #endif
00160   *fx = (hd+Min.par*hp)/(nd+Min.par*np);
00161 
00162   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
00163 
00164   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme      E = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00165           hbc* (*fx), hbc*creal(hd/nd));
00166 }

00168 
00169 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
00170 {
00171   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00172   complex double H, N;
00173 
00174   if (sigterminate)
00175     longjmp(env, 1);
00176   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00177   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00178   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00179   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00180   calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dNd);
00181 #ifdef MPI
00182   calcgradHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHd);
00183 #else
00184   calcgradHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHd);
00185 #endif
00186   hd = Min.dHd->val;
00187   nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00188 
00189   copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00190   invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00191   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X);
00192   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX);
00193   calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dNp);
00194 #ifdef MPI
00195   calcgradHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHp);
00196 #else
00197   calcgradHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHp);
00198 #endif
00199   hp = Min.dHp->val;
00200   np = Min.X->ovlap;
00201 
00202   H = hd+Min.par*hp;
00203   N = nd+Min.par*np;
00204     
00205   zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00206   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHd, 1.0/N);
00207   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHp, Min.par* 1.0/N);
00208   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNd, -H/(N*N));
00209   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNp, -Min.par*H/(N*N));
00210   
00211   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradf);
00212   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
00213   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00214           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*creal(H/N), hbc*creal(hd/nd));
00215 
00216   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
00217     char logfname[255];
00218     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minp.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
00219     FILE* logfp;
00220     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
00221       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
00222     } else {
00223       fprintinfo(logfp);
00224       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00225               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*creal(H/N), hbc*creal(hd/nd));
00226       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00227       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
00228       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
00229       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00230       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
00231       fclose(logfp);
00232     }
00233   }  
00234 
00235 }

00238 #define AMIN 1.0                // do not allow a smaller than AMIN
00239 
00240 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
00241 {
00242   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00243     *gxi = (x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS] - AMIN);
00244   } else if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "AMD") || !strcmp(Min.P->name, "AMDS")) {
00245     // only i=1 possible
00246     *gxi = (x[Min.q->n] - AMIN);
00247   }
00248 }

00252 {
00253 }

00256 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
00257 {
00258   if (sigterminate)
00259     longjmp(env, 1);
00260   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00261   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00262   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00263   
00264   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Min.X, hxi);
00265 
00266   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00267           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
00268 
00269   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
00274 {
00275   if (sigterminate)
00276     longjmp(env, 1);
00277   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00278   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00279   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00280   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00281   zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00282   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00283   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradhi);
00284   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00285           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Min.dH->val));
00286 }

00289 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
00290 {
00291   int i;
00292 
00293   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
00294   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
00295   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a_i}
00296   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00297     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
00298     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
00299       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
00300       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
00301       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
00302     }
00303     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00304       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
00305       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
00306       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
00307     }
00308     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00309       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
00310         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00311     }
00312   // for AMD parameterizations use bound constraints for Re{a}  
00313   } else if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "AMD") || !strcmp(Min.P->name, "AMDS")) {
00314     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 1;
00315     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
00316       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
00317       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
00318       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
00319     }
00320     FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
00321     FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[Min.nconst+1][1] = Min.q->n;
00322     FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
00323     if (Min.q->x[Min.q->n-1] < 0)
00324       Min.q->x[Min.q->n-1] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00325   } else
00326     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
00327   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
00328   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
00329   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
00330   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 0.0;
00331   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
00332 
00333   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
00334     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
00335 }

00338 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
00339 {
00340   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
00341   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
00342   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
00343 }
